items.description: Operating licences / lease documents / block awards

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: OCS lease from BOEM; confirm active status in BSEE TIMS
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: Licence from NSTA; confirm MWO (minimum work obligations) status
jurisdiction_notes.Norway: PDO/APA licence from NPD; confirm block relinquishment schedule

items.notes: Current licence required. Expired or expiring (<2yr) scored Partial.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide copies of all current operating licences, lease documents, and block awards for the assets in scope, together with any renewal documentation, extensions, and correspondence with the regulator regarding licence status.

items.notes: Must show full upstream ownership chain to seller parent.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide a current corporate structure chart showing all entities within the group that hold an interest in the assets, including percentage ownership at each level, jurisdiction of incorporation, and the ultimate beneficial owner.

items.description: Certificate of incorporation / company registration documents
items.notes: Critical for corporate deals; less so for pure asset purchases.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide certificates of incorporation and current constitutional documents (articles of association or equivalent) for all entities within scope of the transaction.

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: Check for ROFR/ROFO provisions triggered by change of control
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: Unitisation and Unit Operating Agreement (UUOA) if applicable

items.notes: Must review for ROFR/ROFO provisions that could be triggered by this transaction.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all shareholder agreements, unitisation agreements, and inter-party agreements relating to the assets, including any amendments. Please confirm whether any right of first refusal or right of first offer provisions are in place and the applicable notice/response periods.

items.notes: Required for corporate deals to confirm no material undisclosed decisions.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide board minutes and material resolutions for the past two years for all entities in scope, redacted for commercially sensitive matters unrelated to the assets.

items.description: Competent Person's Report (CPR) / Independent Reserves Report

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: Should be SEC-compliant (Rule 4-10); check certifier is SEC-qualified
jurisdiction_notes.Norway: Must comply with NPD resource classification framework

items.notes: Must be by a qualified independent petroleum engineer. Age >3yr scored Partial.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the most recent Competent Person's Report (CPR) or Independent Reserves Report prepared by a qualified independent petroleum consultant, including reserves certification, production profiles, and price assumptions. Please also confirm the effective date and whether any updated estimates have been prepared since.

items.notes: Key to verifying subsurface risk and upside.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all geological and geophysical technical reports for the assets, including reservoir studies, petrophysical evaluations, and any recent subsurface interpretation updates. Please indicate which studies are field-specific and which are basin-wide.

items.notes: Confirm transferability of seismic data licence as part of the transaction.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all seismic data and interpretation reports (2D and 3D) available for the assets, together with the associated data licence agreements. Please confirm whether the seismic data licences are transferable to a buyer without additional cost.

items.description: Well logs and completion reports (per well)
items.notes: Historical logs are permanent records; age threshold not applicable.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide digital well logs (LAS format preferred), end-of-well reports, and completion reports for all wells within the assets, including any wells that are currently suspended or have been permanently abandoned.

items.notes: Critical for development assets where reservoir modelling is required.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all Special Core Analysis (SCAL) and Routine Core Analysis (RCAL) data and reports for the reservoir intervals in scope.

items.description: Field Development Plan (FDP) / Approved Development Plan

jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: FDP requires NSTA approval; check approval status and any conditions
jurisdiction_notes.Norway: PDO (Plan for Development and Operation) required; check NPD approval

items.notes: FDP approval status critically important in UKCS/Norway.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the current Field Development Plan (FDP) or equivalent planning document, together with any regulatory approvals, conditions imposed, and correspondence with the competent authority regarding the development programme.

items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: Process and instrumentation diagrams are critical technical documents for understanding facility operations, maintenance requirements, and operational risks. Essential for technical due diligence on producing assets with processing facilities.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide facility p&ids and mechanical drawings.

search_keywords: Coulomb PH II Subsea Truss Jumper on Beach.pdf
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: Visual documentation of facilities provides valuable context for asset condition assessment and helps validate technical reports, though not absolutely critical if detailed inspection reports are available.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide facility photographs and visual documentation.

items.notes: Minimum 3 years preferred; all available history requested.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide historical production data on a well-by-well basis, including gross oil, gas, and water production in monthly intervals, for the full life-of-field where available (minimum 3 years). Please include API numbers, UWIs, or equivalent well identifiers. Electronic format (CSV or Excel) is preferred.

items.description: Operator monthly production reports / LOE statements
items.notes: Last 12–24 months most relevant; confirms actuals vs CPR forecast.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the most recent 24 months of operator monthly production reports and lease operating expense (LOE) statements, including joint interest billings (JIBs). These should reconcile to the audited accounts.

items.notes: Identifies production interruption risk and maintenance backlog.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide facility uptime and production efficiency records for the last 3 years, including a summary of planned and unplanned shutdowns, the cause of each downtime event, and the production volumes deferred.

items.notes: Must be reconcilable to CPR production profiles.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the seller's or operator's base-case production forecast in electronic format (Excel preferred), showing gross and net production by well or field on an annual basis, including the key assumptions underpinning the forecast.

items.notes: Primary deal document — confirms asset description and seller's narrative.
items.drl_request_text: Please confirm the Information Memorandum provided is the most current version, and provide any updates or addenda issued since its initial distribution.
Please provide the most recent Management Presentation and any technical presentation materials used in management meetings.

items.description: Oil / gas / NGL sales agreements and offtake contracts

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: Check take-or-pay provisions and any pipeline capacity commitments

items.notes: Review for pricing formula, duration, take-or-pay obligations, termination rights.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all oil, gas, and NGL sales agreements, offtake contracts, and marketing arrangements currently in effect, including any amendments, side letters, and hedging arrangements. Please provide a summary of any take-or-pay obligations outstanding.

items.description: Gas gathering, processing, and transportation agreements
items.notes: Check expiry vs. life-of-field; capacity constraints are material.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all gas gathering, processing, and transportation agreements, together with any capacity booking confirmations and correspondence with pipeline operators regarding future capacity availability.

items.notes: 3yr minimum; check for qualified opinions or going concern language.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide audited financial statements for the last three fiscal years for all entities in scope (or the most recent available), including the auditor's report. If accounts are not yet audited for the most recent period, please provide management accounts for that period.

items.notes: Must be reconcilable to audited accounts.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the most recent management accounts, including year-to-date income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow statement, with comparatives against budget.

items.notes: Request with all formulae unlocked. Check price deck assumptions.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the seller's financial model (in Excel with all formulae unlocked), including the production forecast, price deck, OPEX/CAPEX schedule, fiscal terms, and NPV/IRR outputs. Please confirm the effective date and price deck source (strip, management, or budget).

items.notes: Track record of cost delivery is a key valuation risk.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide OPEX and CAPEX budget versus actual summaries for the last three years, including an explanation for any material variances. Please also provide the current year budget and the forward capital programme.

jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: Ring-fence status, supplementary charge credits, and investment allowance claims
jurisdiction_notes.Norway: Uplift claims and refundable exploration tax position
jurisdiction_notes.GoM: Federal income tax position and any state tax exposure

items.notes: Tax losses and credits can be material value drivers.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the current tax position of the entities in scope, including a schedule of tax losses, deferred tax assets/liabilities, and any open tax years. Please also provide any recent correspondence with tax authorities and any tax opinions or rulings relevant to the transaction.

items.description: Shareholder loan agreements and intercompany financing arrangements
search_keywords: 4.10.1 Byron Energy Stucture and commnets intercompany loan summary.pdf
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: Shareholder loans are critical for understanding the capital structure, related party transactions, and potential liabilities that transfer with the asset or entity For asset sales (vs corporate acquisitions), shareholder loans are typically a corporate-level item not transferred with the asset; downgraded to GTH for producing_asset and development deal types.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide shareholder loan agreements and intercompany financing arrangements.

items.description: Third-party debt facilities and credit agreements
search_keywords: 4.9.1.2 EXECUTED - Officer's Certificate - Byron, BELLC, & BEL (7-28-2023) - with compiled Exhibits(6129720.1).pdf
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: External debt facilities are essential for understanding leverage, covenants, change of control provisions, and financing obligations that may impact or transfer with the transaction For asset sales, third-party debt at the corporate level is typically not transferred with the asset; downgraded to GTH for producing_asset and development deal types.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide third-party debt facilities and credit agreements.

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: Review for ROFR, operator removal threshold, abandonment and decommissioning provisions
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: Check UKOA (UKCS Operating Agreement) standard clauses; cash call provisions

items.notes: Must review ROFR/ROFO, operator removal, sole risk, and CoC provisions.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all Joint Operating Agreements (JOAs) and any amendments, side letters, or supplemental agreements currently in force for each licence. Please confirm working interest percentages as set out in the JOA and identify any provisions that would be triggered by the proposed transaction.

items.notes: International/PSC jurisdictions only (not applicable to GoM federal leases, UKCS licences, or Norway PDO). Review for cost recovery, profit oil, and government back-in provisions.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all Production Sharing Contracts (PSCs), concession agreements, or equivalent arrangements with the host government, together with any side letters, ministerial correspondence, and stabilisation provisions.

items.description: Sale & Purchase Agreement (SPA) / draft or heads of terms
items.notes: Review all reps & warranties, indemnities, price adjustments, and closing conditions.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the most current draft Sale and Purchase Agreement (or Purchase and Sale Agreement), together with any agreed schedules, exhibits, and associated documents including escrow arrangements. Please confirm the proposed effective date and closing conditions.

items.description: Title opinion / chain of title documents

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: BOEM assignment approval required; confirm no outstanding assignments
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: NSTA consent to assignment required; check CoA timeline

items.notes: Full chain of title essential. Identify any gaps or un-recorded transfers.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all documents evidencing the chain of title for the assets, including assignments, deeds of assignment, government approvals, and title opinions. Please identify any outstanding consents to assign required from third parties or regulators in connection with the proposed transaction.

items.description: Consent to Assign (CoA) requirements and waivers
items.notes: Must be obtained before deal closes. Identify all required consents at outset.
items.drl_request_text: Please confirm all third-party and regulatory consents required for the proposed transaction (including under the JOA, government licences, and any commercial agreements), and provide copies of any pre-emptive right waivers or consent letters already obtained.

items.description: Performance bonds and escrow security arrangements
search_keywords: 5.8.1.2 Bryon Security Agreement Escrow Account _INIC_Final_fully executed.pdf
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: Bonds and escrow arrangements are critical legal obligations that secure regulatory compliance and operational performance, directly impacting asset transferability and ongoing obligations
items.drl_request_text: Please provide performance bonds and escrow security arrangements.

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: EPA NPDES permit; BSEE SPCC plan; air emissions permit
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: Environmental Statement; OPRED emissions permit; SEPA consents
jurisdiction_notes.Norway: Pollution Control Act permits; flaring consents

items.notes: Any expired permits are a material issue. Review compliance status.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all current environmental permits, approvals, and authorisations for the assets, including any correspondence with the environmental regulator regarding compliance status. Please flag any permits that are under renewal or where compliance issues have been raised.

items.notes: Review for mitigation commitments still outstanding.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all Environmental Impact Assessments (EIAs) or Environmental Statements prepared for the assets, including any monitoring reports and evidence that commitments made in those assessments have been discharged.

items.description: Regulatory inspection records and notices of violation (NOVs)
items.notes: Any open NOVs or enforcement actions are red flags. Request 5yr history.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all regulatory inspection records, Notices of Violation (NOVs), enforcement actions, and compliance correspondence received in the last five years, together with evidence of corrective actions taken and any outstanding obligations.

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: BSEE decom plan; BOEM bonding requirements; check BSEE TIMS for P&A status
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: NSTA approved abandonment programme; check OPRED decom consent

items.notes: P50/P70/P90 estimates required. Plans >5yr old scored Partial.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all decommissioning plans and cost estimates for the assets, including the P50, P70, and P90 cost scenarios where available. Please confirm the basis of the estimate, the effective date, and whether the estimate has been reviewed by the regulator.

items.description: ARO provision in balance sheet / actuarial assessment
items.notes: Compare balance sheet provision to P50/P70 cost estimate. Flag any understatement.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the ARO or decommissioning provision as recorded in the most recent balance sheet, together with the assumptions used to calculate it, including the discount rate, escalation rate, and expected decommissioning date.

jurisdiction_notes.GoM: BSEE TIMS database; confirm no outstanding P&A obligations past due
jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: NSTA well status database; confirm no over-held wells

items.notes: Outstanding P&A obligations past regulatory deadline = critical red flag.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all regulatory filings confirming the abandonment status of wells that have ceased production, including evidence of satisfactory P&A completion. Please identify any wells currently on suspension and provide the regulatory approval and expected P&A date.

items.notes: Check for minimum commitment periods and early termination fees.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all current drilling contracts and rig commitments, including any minimum commitment periods, dayrate escalation provisions, and early termination fee schedules.

items.notes: Onshore and shallow-water GoM assets only — SWD capacity is often a production constraint. Not applicable to deepwater/platform-hosted production where produced water is re-injected or disposed offshore.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all saltwater disposal (SWD) agreements and permits, including current disposal volumes, contract capacity, and any operational restrictions or constraints relevant to production targets.

items.notes: Check for step-in rights, tariff escalation, and capacity guarantees.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all pipeline, infrastructure access, and production handling agreements, including tariff schedules, capacity reservations, and any step-in or pre-emption rights.

items.description: Office lease agreements and real estate contracts
search_keywords: 8.4.1 Byron 425 Settlers Trace Lease with 2nd Amendment.pdf
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: Office leases represent ongoing operational commitments and costs that are relevant for corporate acquisitions to understand overhead obligations and potential assignment requirements
items.drl_request_text: Please provide office lease agreements and real estate contracts.

items.notes: Identify key person dependencies and retention risk.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide CVs or professional biographies for all key operational and management personnel identified in the Information Memorandum, including their tenure with the company and prior relevant experience.

items.description: Employment contracts (key personnel) and retention arrangements
items.notes: Review for change-of-control provisions and non-compete clauses.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide employment contracts and retention arrangements for key personnel, redacted for personal information. Please highlight any change-of-control provisions, retention bonuses contingent on the transaction, or restrictive covenant arrangements.

items.description: Employee benefit plan agreements and retirement plans
items.notes: Added via self-learning on 2026-02-27. Reasoning: 401k and benefit plan agreements are important for corporate deals to understand employee obligations, fiduciary responsibilities, and transition requirements for benefit programs
items.drl_request_text: Please provide employee benefit plan agreements and retirement plans.

items.notes: Review for adequacy of coverage vs industry minimums and asset risk.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide current insurance certificates and policy schedules for all material policies in force, including control of well, operator's extra expense, general liability, and property insurance. Please confirm coverage limits and any exclusions relevant to the assets.

items.notes: Material or recurring claims may indicate operational risk.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide a summary of all insurance claims made in the last three years, including the nature of each claim, the amount claimed, and the outcome.

items.description: Schedule of ongoing and threatened litigation
items.notes: Any material litigation is a red flag. Request 5yr look-back.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide a schedule of all ongoing, threatened, or pending litigation, arbitration, regulatory proceedings, or material disputes to which any entity in scope is a party, or which relate to the assets. Please include the nature of the claim, the amount at issue, and the current status.

items.notes: Any enforcement action or prosecution in last 5 years must be disclosed.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all regulatory enforcement actions, Incidents of Non-Compliance (INCs), civil penalties, and material correspondence with regulators relating to the assets or any entity in scope in the last five years, together with evidence of corrective actions taken.

jurisdiction_notes.UKCS: OPRED accepted Safety Case required; check revision date vs 5yr threshold

items.notes: UKCS/Norway only. Safety Case >5yr without update is Partial.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the current accepted Safety Case (UKCS) or Safety Management System documentation, including the date of last formal review and any open safety-critical element findings.

items.description: HSE incident history (Tier 1/2 LOPC, LTIs, fatalities)
items.notes: Any Tier 1/2 LOPC, LTI, or fatality in last 5yr is a red flag requiring explanation.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide the HSE incident history for the last five years, including all Tier 1 and Tier 2 Loss of Primary Containment (LOPC) events, Lost Time Injuries (LTIs), fatalities, regulatory notifications, and Root Cause Analysis reports.

items.notes: Confirm transferability and any per-seat or per-use fees on transfer.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide all seismic data licence agreements covering data in the VDR, and confirm whether these licences are transferable to a buyer. Please provide any vendor correspondence regarding transfer fees or restrictions.

items.notes: Identify licences that cannot be transferred and require re-licensing at cost.
items.drl_request_text: Please provide a schedule of all software licences used in connection with the assets (including reservoir simulators, geomodelling tools, and production management software) and confirm whether these licences are transferable as part of the transaction.
